snippet.title: Together in Between  - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Together in Between first official teaser.

The demo is available on Steam, we are close to full release and the game is in polishing state.

Together in Between is an unique co-op puzzle adventure experience that challenges the boundaries of perception, main characters are stuck in a realm that is divided into two dimensions, they must rely solely on their voices, they can't see or touch each other. Their only escape is through solving challenges given by the sorcerer to find the magical book of Dimensia.

Twitter : https://twitter.com/VellichorGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/VellichorGames/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@vellichorgames
Tiktok : https://www.tiktok.com/@VellichorGames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/Vellichor-Games
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2455340/Together_in_Between/
